Title: Creates a school budget tax cap exemption for expenditures resulting from settlements or jury awards under the child victims act
Summary: Creates a school budget tax cap exemption for expenditures resulting from settlements or jury awards for civil actions brought against school districts under the child victims act.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating a school budget tax cap exemption for expenditures resulting from settlement awards in civil actions brought against school districts under the child victims act
